channel.title: CVE Feed for Hundred Plus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hundred Plus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-32540|2024-09-16T22:09:39.642Z -- hundred%20plus -- 101eip
item.description: Add announcement function in the 101EIP system does not filter special characters, which allows authenticated users to inject JavaScript and perform a stored XSS attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-32539|2024-09-16T18:34:37.629Z -- hundred%20plus -- 101eip
item.description: Add event in calendar function in the 101EIP system does not filter special characters in specific fields, which allows remote authenticated users to inject JavaScript and perform a stored XSS attack.
